package.name: text_subscriber
package.description: This is a **Subscribr** package. It contains a node that: - Subscribes to the `TextStamped` topic. - When a message is received: - Prints the received text. - Prints the timestamp included in the message. - Prints the current ROS time. - Calculates and prints the time difference between the timestamp and the current time (i.e., delivery delay).
